info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Question Answering Authoring
info.description:
The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills
built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms.  The API can be
used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key
phrase extraction, language detection and question answering.

parameters.name: Endpoint
parameters.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoint (e.g., https://<resource-name>.api.cognitiveservices.azure.com).

lastDeployedDateTime.description: Represents the project last deployment date-time.

defaultAnswer.description: Default Answer response when no good match is found in the knowledge base.

isContextOnly.description:
To mark if a prompt is relevant only with a previous question or not. If true,
do not include this QnA as answer for queries without context; otherwise,
ignores context and includes this QnA in answers.

prompts.description: List of prompts associated with the answer.

displayOrder.description: Index of the prompt. It is used for ordering of the prompts.

qnaId.description: ID of the QnA corresponding to the prompt.

qna.description: QnA record. Either QnAId or QnA record needs to be present in a Prompt.

displayText.description: Text displayed to represent a follow up question prompt.

source.description:
Source from which QnA was indexed e.g.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/QnAMaker/FAQs .

questions.description: List of questions associated with the answer.

metadata.description:
Metadata associated with the answer, useful to categorize or filter question
answers.

activeLearningSuggestions.description: List of Active Learning suggestions for the QnA.

QnaSourceMetadata.description: Input source file or url details.

source.description:
Unique source identifier. Name of the file if it's a 'file' source; otherwise,
the complete URL if it's a 'url' source.

sourceUri.description: URI location for the file or url.

language.description:
Language of the text records. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For
example, use "en" for English; "es" for Spanish etc. If not set, use "en" for
English as default.

multilingualResource.description: Resource enabled for multiple languages across projects or not.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Represents the project last modified date-time.

lastDeployedDateTime.description: Represents the project last deployment date-time.

configureSemanticRanking.description: Represents if semantic ranking is configured.

English as default.

configureSemanticRanking.description: Represents if semantic ranking is configured.
